item.description:
PRESCOTT PARK ARTS FESTIVAL presents The David Wax Museum !!

We LOVE to showcase something new and special.  And this is it!  This rising band has been "kicking up a cloud of excitement with their high-energy border-crossing sensibility" (The New Yorker).

Recently anointed as Americana Artist of the Year (2010 Boston Music Awards), this band is "pure, irresistible joy" (NPR).   After making them a top pick at South by Southwest this year, TIME hailed them for their "virtuosic musical skill and virtuous harmonies."

 And NPR picked their performance as the highlight of the entire Newport Folk Fest last year.

Ya gotta love a band whose signature instrument is the jawbone of a donkey .

-These concerts are very well attended. Arrive as early as possible

-Bring a chair or blanket.

- Meet by 6:30pm.  Music starts at 7pm.  It might be difficult to find us if you arrive after the music begins...

 

THERE IS A SUGGESTED DONATION OF $8 AT THE DOOR.
item.how_to_find_us: House Left - Near the electric pole - Call me to meet
item.name: The David Wax Museum
